alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene; Monroe; Morgan; Owen; Sullivan; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 10:57PM EDT until March 31 at 11:30PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Vigo County in west central Indiana... Northwestern Monroe County in south central Indiana... Southern Morgan County in central Indiana... Sullivan County in southwestern Indiana... Southern Clay County in west central Indiana... Owen County in west central Indiana... Greene County in southwestern Indiana... * Until 1130 PM EDT. * At 1057 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles south of Brazil to 10 miles northeast of Sullivan to near Palestine, moving east at 75 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Jasonville, Center Point, Coalmont, Bowling Green and Saline City around 1100 PM EDT. Shelburn, Clay City and Coal City around 1105 PM EDT. Dugger and Patricksburg around 1110 PM EDT. Linton, Quincy, Devore and Vicksburg around 1115 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Spencer, Worthington, Paragon, Switz City, McCormicks Creek State Park, Martinsville, Ellettsville, Gosport, Stinesville, Freedom and Solsberry. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for south central, central, southwestern and west central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Greene; Monroe; Morgan; Owen; Sullivan; Vigo
